lines.text: All the evidence has been labeled and recorded, see?
But did you... find anything useful?
Listen, kid. What is it you think detectives do?
A detective’s job is to go over the crime scene and put little yellow cards next to everything, so someone else can come by later and put it all in labeled bags.
Listen. ''Solving'' this crime is optional, see? Everyone’s dead. Nobody’s pressing charges. All I need to do is get everything neat for the books.
That’s- then- why did you even wake me up at three in the morning, then?!
Because getting everything neat for the books means following procedure, and procedure calls for calling in an arcane consultant when magic’s involved.
...So I’m here as a formality, then.
Hm? Are you- are you done briefing the consultant, Officer Fleini?
